message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a price that I think is a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you is $15,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm aiming to pay closer to $13,000.  I know you're willing to sell for less than John, so I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thanks for your understanding, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $13,500. This is the lowest price I can go, considering its value to me is $12,000 to you is $15,000, so I'm giving you a good discount.
